channel.title: THE FAVOR OF STORM
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "THE FAVOR OF STORM" - can some1 teach me ?

item.title: Re: THE FAVOR OF STORM
item.content:encoded:
First look to see which cowl you have from the following:

  • Cowl of the Second HoCage - +5 Sandstorm MPH per mission, +1 Range
  • Wasteland Cowl - +3 Sandstorm MPH per mission
  • Dark Cowl - +2 Sandstorm MPH per mission
  • Basic Cowl - +1 Sandstorm MPH per mission

Now for whichever one you have look to the right, that is the amount of MPH you get for EACH mission. Once you reach 7,500 MPH, you will recieve a favor the day AFTER you reach 7,500 MPH. If you still have questions, dont be afraid to ask.

item.title: Re: THE FAVOR OF STORM
item.content:encoded: so i cannot just do missions to get some favor points? all i can do is wait for dayroll?

item.title: Re: THE FAVOR OF STORM
item.content:encoded: Once you get a favor (it checks your MPH at dayroll), you can use it immediately. You do not start off with a Favor right after getting the bloodline, you need to get MPH (which thankfully loops). Favor Effects happen immediately (with the possible exception of the r00t based ones as I have not used those yet).
